About WEGO

Founded in 1988, WEGO Group has become one of the leading medical solution suppliers in China with 32 years of development, WEGO owns 10 industrial groups with more than 90 subsidiaries, 2 listed companies and employees exceed 30,000 people. We have entered into 11 fields out of 15 segmented medical markets with more than 1000 varieties of products available.

Create a healthy future, Trustworthy

As one of the most safe and reliable suppliers of medical system solutions in the world , we have been listed as one of the top 500 enterprises of China in 2020 and we are the only medical enterprise selected in this list.

Product center

Main product directions of WEGO Intracardiac Consumables Group include: Neurointervention,Cardiovascular intervention and peripheral intervention consumables.Interventional therapy is characterized by small trauma, simple, safe, effective, fewer complications and significantly shorter hospital stay.

Minimize the risk Maximize the outcome

News center

Taking cardiovascular intervention, neurointervention and peripheral intervention consumables as the development direction, expanding in the international market with footholding in domestic market, to become an influential company in the world and the first-class in this industry.

Weigao Group was awarded the title of "the sixth National Civilized Unit"

On November 20, the National spiritual civilization construction commendation conference was held in Beijing, the conference commended the sixth national civilized city, civilized town, civilized unit, etc., Weigao Group won the "national civilized Unit" title...
